Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Orchard Hotel Singapore, you'll be centrally located in Singapore, steps from Tanglin Shopping Centre and Orchard Tower. This 4.5-star hotel is close to National Orchid Garden and Chinatown Heritage Center.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 656 guestrooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy a range of recreational amenities, including a nightclub, an outdoor pool, and a sauna. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and wedding services. If you're planning a day at a nearby theme park, you can hop on the complimentary shuttle.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 3 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a 24-hour business center, and limo/town car service. Planning an event in Singapore? This hotel has 21605 square feet (2007.2 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center, conference space, and meeting rooms. Free valet parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 3 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service. Relax with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge or a poolside bar. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Orchard Hotel Singapore, you'll be centrally located in Singapore, steps from Tanglin Shopping Centre and Orchard Tower. This 4.5-star hotel is close to National Orchid Garden and Chinatown Heritage Center.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Tanglin Shopping Centre - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Orchard Tower - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Royal Thai Embassy - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
DFS Galleria Singapore - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Shaw Centre - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
ION Orchard - 0.6 km / 0.3 mi
Far East Plaza - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Wisma Atria - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Lucky Plaza - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Ngee Ann City - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Paragon Shopping Centre - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Mount Elizabeth Medical Center - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Takashimaya Shopping Centre - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Orchard Road - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Singapore Botanic Gardens - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi

The preferred airport for Orchard Hotel Singapore is Singapore (SIN-Changi) - 18.7 km / 11.6 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Orchard Hotel Singapore is Singapore (SIN-Changi) - 18.7 km / 11.6 mi.

Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Room 1

Notice
With bookings that include children, please note that the children may be accommodated in the existing bedding and not in separate beds. An extra bed can often be provided at an extra charge pre travel or locally if required.


Check-in time into the Hotel is from 14:00 hours. Check-out time is 12:00 hours. Late Departures up to 18:00 hours are possible, subject to availability and prior arrangement with the Hotel. Additional charges may be imposed by the Hotel for unarranged late departures. Day use room requirements should be requested at time of reservation and are subject to availability.

Message.Text:
Essential Information: Room 1

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Hotel Tariff Notes: Rate is applicable for consecutive booking of 5 rooms and below. no refund of unutilised room nights for shortened stay. Bed Type preference is subjected to availability upon check-in. The enhancement work will take place and works will be carried our on Monday to Saturday from 9am to 12pm and 2pm to 6pm. The hotel will undergo renovation of some public areas and the Orchard Wing guestrooms until approximately 30/06/2019. The working hours are between 09:00 and 12:00 and 14:00 and 18:00, Monday to Saturday. Some noise and visual disturbance is expected. The hotel has completed its latest phase of the enhancement, unveiling the brand new areas of the hotel. The hotel will be finishing the refurbishment by June 17, 2019.
